<details><summary>Tool use: **command** • Run command: cd /Users/i306072/Documents/GitHub/Fin2 && git commit -m "refactor: Claude refactor - architecture improvements and code quality

## Summary
Major refactoring of the SAP BTP Financial Operations Dashboard to improve 
code maintainability, consistency, and scalability.

## Changes

### 1. Centralized Navigation Configuration
- Created src/config/routes.config.js - single source of truth for view-to-component mapping
- Created src/config/navigation.config.js - centralized nav structure and metadata
- Refactored Navigation.jsx to import from config instead of hardcoding nav items
- Refactored MainContainer.jsx to use routes config with dynamic component loading

### 2. View Constants
- Created src/constants/views.js with all view ID constants
- Replaced all hardcoded view strings ('overview', 'service-manager', etc.)
- Benefits: IDE autocomplete, compile-time typo detection, easier refactoring

### 3. Standardized Page Organization
- Moved single-file pages into proper folder structure:
  * Signavio.jsx → Signavio/index.jsx
  * SACDashboard.jsx → SACDashboard/index.jsx  
  * ServiceAndAssetManager.jsx → ServiceAndAssetManager/index.jsx
- Created ServiceDetails/index.jsx
- Moved ServiceManager out of BillingVerification/ to top-level pages/
- Deleted empty BillingVerification/ folder

### 4. PropTypes Validation
- Added PropTypes to UI components:
  * Button.jsx - variant, size, disabled, type props
  * Card.jsx - title, icon, value, trend, className props
  * Dropdown.jsx - items, onSelect, activeItem, label props
  * ProgressBar.jsx - value, label, color, showPercentage props
  * Table.jsx - columns, data, onRowClick, className, emptyMessage props
- Added defaultProps for optional props

### 5. Documentation
- Created CLAUDE.md - comprehensive AI assistant guidance for the codebase
- Created REFACTORING_PLAN.md - detailed refactoring roadmap
- Updated SERVICE_MANAGER_IMPLEMENTATION.md

### 6. Bug Fixes
- Fixed Overview/ForecastTable.jsx to use VIEWS constants for navigation
- Fixed Overview/index.jsx imports
- Updated useNavigation.js hook

## Files Changed
- 21 files modified
- 11 new files created  
- 7 files deleted (moved/reorganized)

## Benefits
- Single place to add new features (config files)
- Type-safe view IDs prevent runtime errors
- Predictable file locations for all pages
- Self-documenting component APIs via PropTypes
- Comprehensive documentation for AI-assisted development"</summary>

```bash
cd /Users/i306072/Documents/GitHub/Fin2 && git commit -m "refactor: Claude refactor - architecture improvements and code quality

## Summary
Major refactoring of the SAP BTP Financial Operations Dashboard to improve 
code maintainability, consistency, and scalability.

## Changes

### 1. Centralized Navigation Configuration
- Created src/config/routes.config.js - single source of truth for view-to-component mapping
- Created src/config/navigation.config.js - centralized nav structure and metadata
- Refactored Navigation.jsx to import from config instead of hardcoding nav items
- Refactored MainContainer.jsx to use routes config with dynamic component loading

### 2. View Constants
- Created src/constants/views.js with all view ID constants
- Replaced all hardcoded view strings ('overview', 'service-manager', etc.)
- Benefits: IDE autocomplete, compile-time typo detection, easier refactoring

### 3. Standardized Page Organization
- Moved single-file pages into proper folder structure:
  * Signavio.jsx → Signavio/index.jsx
  * SACDashboard.jsx → SACDashboard/index.jsx  
  * ServiceAndAssetManager.jsx → ServiceAndAssetManager/index.jsx
- Created ServiceDetails/index.jsx
- Moved ServiceManager out of BillingVerification/ to top-level pages/
- Deleted empty BillingVerification/ folder

### 4. PropTypes Validation
- Added PropTypes to UI components:
  * Button.jsx - variant, size, disabled, type props
  * Card.jsx - title, icon, value, trend, className props
  * Dropdown.jsx - items, onSelect, activeItem, label props
  * ProgressBar.jsx - value, label, color, showPercentage props
  * Table.jsx - columns, data, onRowClick, className, emptyMessage props
- Added defaultProps for optional props

### 5. Documentation
- Created CLAUDE.md - comprehensive AI assistant guidance for the codebase
- Created REFACTORING_PLAN.md - detailed refactoring roadmap
- Updated SERVICE_MANAGER_IMPLEMENTATION.md

### 6. Bug Fixes
- Fixed Overview/ForecastTable.jsx to use VIEWS constants for navigation
- Fixed Overview/index.jsx imports
- Updated useNavigation.js hook

## Files Changed
- 21 files modified
- 11 new files created  
- 7 files deleted (moved/reorganized)

## Benefits
- Single place to add new features (config files)
- Type-safe view IDs prevent runtime errors
- Predictable file locations for all pages
- Self-documenting component APIs via PropTypes
- Comprehensive documentation for AI-assisted development"
```

---

**To push, you'll need to either:**

1. **Create the repository on GitHub first** at https://github.com/new

2. **Or update the remote URL** if the repo exists elsewhere:
   ```bash
   git remote set-url origin <correct-url>
   git push --set-upstream origin main
   ```

3. **Or use SSH** if you have that configured:
   ```bash
   git remote set-url origin git@github.com:i306072/Fin2.git
   git push --set-upstream origin main
   ```

Would you like me to help with any of these options?
